text: Abangavumelekanga kuwe (Muhammad) ngabo nabaphi na abafazi abasisongezelelo emva koku, kungavumelekanga kananjalo kuwe okokuba ubatshintshe ngabanye abafazi, enokuba ubuhle babo bunomtsalane kuwe kangakanani na, ngaphandle kwabo isandla sakho sokunene sibabambileyo. UAll√¢h nguMnoneleli ngaphezu kwezinto zonke
